Detailed Description

template<class V>
class Cam< V >

The Cam class is the root subclass for all cameras.

A Cam has a Viewport, through which it sees the scene. It also has a position and a modelview, which makes it compatible with OpenGL.

See also:
Cam2
Cam3
Author:
Ben Constable, original Java code by Oli Winks
Version:
1.0
